item.title: My First Post
item.description: Ridge and Lasso Packages library(ISLR) library(tidyverse) library(glmnet) sampling Hitters <- na.omit(Hitters) x <- model.matrix(Salary ~ ., Hitters)[, -1] y <- Hitters$Salary set.seed(1) train <- sample(1:nrow(x), nrow(x) / 2) test <- (-train) y.test <- y[test] ridge regression grid <- 10 ^ seq(10, -2, length = 100) ridge.mod <- glmnet(x, y, alpha = 0, lambda = grid) plot(ridge.mod, main = "The ridge") the lasso lasso.mod <- glmnet(x[train, ], y[train], alpha = 1, lambda = grid) plot(lasso.
